DOC.brief_summary: Introduction : Kinetic , kinematic electromyographic activity lower limb show influenced various footwear-generated biomechanical manipulation ( e.g . sol . Insoles , orthoses ) . A novel biomechanical device comprise four modular element attach onto foot-worn platform recently develop . Each element individually calibrate ( Position , convexity , height resilience ) induce specific biomechanical challenge . Objectives : The aim study evaluate influence specific biomechanical challenge Kinetics , kinematics electromyographic activity low limb . Design : Prospective , case control Setting : Motion analysis conduct level walking ( 1 ) three-dimensional motion analysis system ( 2 ) ground reaction force analysis use force platform ( 3 ) Electro-Myography system . Each subject examine 16 different setting biomechanical system
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Custom-Made Biomechanical Perturbation Platform Kinetics , Kinematics Electromyography Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy Similar anthorpometric profile ( i.e . weight , shoe size , height , dominant leg ) Previous orthopedic , musculosceletal neurological pathology
